NETWORK B $(\phi_{1,2}=2, \phi_{1,3}=1, \phi_{2,3}=1)$   (z1=a, z2=b, z3=c) (q1=x, q2=y, q3=z) b=0.5
#a connected only to b, both in supply and demand
#b connected to a,c both supply demand
#c connected only to b, both in supply and demand

P1= 10 - 0.5*(q2) - (q1)
P2= 10 - 0.5*(q1) - 0.5*(q3) - (q2)
P3= 10 - 0.5*(q2) - (q3)

C1= 5 - (a1) - (a2) - ((n)*(b1)) - ((n)*(b2))
C2= 5 - (b1) - (b2) - (b3) - ((n)*(a1)) - ((n)*(a2)) - ((n)*(c1))
C3= 5 - (c1) - (c2) - ((n)*(b1))




P1= 
P1= 10 - 0.5*(0.571428571428571*a1*n - 0.142857142857143*a1 + 0.571428571428571*a2*n - 0.142857142857143*a2 - 0.285714285714286*b1*n + 0.571428571428571*b1 - 0.142857142857143*b2*n + 0.571428571428571*b2 + 0.571428571428571*b3 + 0.571428571428571*c1*n - 0.142857142857143*c1 - 0.142857142857143*c2 + 1.42857142857143) - (-0.142857142857143*a1*n + 0.535714285714286*a1 - 0.142857142857143*a2*n + 0.535714285714286*a2 + 0.571428571428571*b1*n - 0.142857142857143*b1 + 0.535714285714286*b2*n - 0.142857142857143*b2 - 0.142857142857143*b3 - 0.142857142857143*c1*n + 0.0357142857142857*c1 + 0.0357142857142857*c2 + 2.14285714285714)


P1=
-0.142857142857142*a1*n - 0.464285714285715*a1 - 0.142857142857142*a2*n - 0.464285714285715*a2 - 0.428571428571428*b1*n - 0.142857142857142*b1 - 0.464285714285715*b2*n - 0.142857142857142*b2 - 0.142857142857142*b3 - 0.142857142857142*c1*n + 0.0357142857142858*c1 + 0.0357142857142858*c2 + 7.14285714285714



Profit1=
(-0.142857142857142*a1*n - 0.464285714285715*a1 - 0.142857142857142*a2*n - 0.464285714285715*a2 - 0.428571428571428*b1*n - 0.142857142857142*b1 - 0.464285714285715*b2*n - 0.142857142857142*b2 - 0.142857142857142*b3 - 0.142857142857142*c1*n + 0.0357142857142858*c1 + 0.0357142857142858*c2 + 7.14285714285714)*(-0.142857142857143*a1*n + 0.535714285714286*a1 - 0.142857142857143*a2*n + 0.535714285714286*a2 + 0.571428571428571*b1*n - 0.142857142857143*b1 + 0.535714285714286*b2*n - 0.142857142857143*b2 - 0.142857142857143*b3 - 0.142857142857143*c1*n + 0.0357142857142857*c1 + 0.0357142857142857*c2 + 2.14285714285714) - (5 - (a1) - (a2) - ((n)*(b1)) - ((n)*(b2)))*(-0.142857142857143*a1*n + 0.535714285714286*a1 - 0.142857142857143*a2*n + 0.535714285714286*a2 + 0.571428571428571*b1*n - 0.142857142857143*b1 + 0.535714285714286*b2*n - 0.142857142857143*b2 - 0.142857142857143*b3 - 0.142857142857143*c1*n + 0.0357142857142857*c1 + 0.0357142857142857*c2 + 2.14285714285714) - 4*a1**2 - 4*a2**2


Second derivative of the function with respect to a1
-0.285714285714286*n + 2*(0.142857142857142*n + 0.464285714285715)*(0.142857142857143*n - 0.535714285714286) - 6.92857142857143

Second derivative of the function with respect to a2
-0.285714285714286*n + 2*(0.142857142857142*n + 0.464285714285715)*(0.142857142857143*n - 0.535714285714286) - 6.92857142857143


The function is concave with respect to a1 for n = 0
The function is concave with respect to a1 for n = 1
The function is concave with respect to a1 for n = 0.2
The function is concave with respect to a1 for n = 0.5
The function is concave with respect to a1 for n = 0.8


The function is concave with respect to a2 for n = 0
The function is concave with respect to a2 for n = 1
The function is concave with respect to a2 for n = 0.2
The function is concave with respect to a2 for n = 0.5
The function is concave with respect to a2 for n = 0.8


The first derivative of the profits with respect to a1 is:
-0.142857142857143*a1*n - 7.46428571428571*a1 - 0.142857142857143*a2*n + 0.535714285714286*a2 + 0.571428571428571*b1*n - 0.142857142857143*b1 + 0.535714285714286*b2*n - 0.142857142857143*b2 - 0.142857142857143*b3 - 0.142857142857143*c1*n + 0.0357142857142857*c1 + 0.0357142857142857*c2 + (0.535714285714286 - 0.142857142857143*n)*(a1 + a2 + b1*n + b2*n - 5) + (0.535714285714286 - 0.142857142857143*n)*(-0.142857142857142*a1*n - 0.464285714285715*a1 - 0.142857142857142*a2*n - 0.464285714285715*a2 - 0.428571428571428*b1*n - 0.142857142857142*b1 - 0.464285714285715*b2*n - 0.142857142857142*b2 - 0.142857142857142*b3 - 0.142857142857142*c1*n + 0.0357142857142858*c1 + 0.0357142857142858*c2 + 7.14285714285714) + (-0.142857142857142*n - 0.464285714285715)*(-0.142857142857143*a1*n + 0.535714285714286*a1 - 0.142857142857143*a2*n + 0.535714285714286*a2 + 0.571428571428571*b1*n - 0.142857142857143*b1 + 0.535714285714286*b2*n - 0.142857142857143*b2 - 0.142857142857143*b3 - 0.142857142857143*c1*n + 0.0357142857142857*c1 + 0.0357142857142857*c2 + 2.14285714285714) + 2.14285714285714


The first derivative of the profits with respect to a2 is:

#firm 2 k=6 b=0.5

P2= 
10 - 0.5*(-0.142857142857143*a1*n + 0.535714285714286*a1 - 0.142857142857143*a2*n + 0.535714285714286*a2 + 0.571428571428571*b1*n - 0.142857142857143*b1 + 0.535714285714286*b2*n - 0.142857142857143*b2 - 0.142857142857143*b3 - 0.142857142857143*c1*n + 0.0357142857142857*c1 + 0.0357142857142857*c2 + 2.14285714285714) - 0.5*(-0.142857142857143*a1*n + 0.0357142857142857*a1 - 0.142857142857143*a2*n + 0.0357142857142857*a2 + 0.571428571428571*b1*n - 0.142857142857143*b1 + 0.0357142857142857*b2*n - 0.142857142857143*b2 - 0.142857142857143*b3 - 0.142857142857143*c1*n + 0.535714285714286*c1 + 0.535714285714286*c2 + 2.14285714285714) - (0.571428571428571*a1*n - 0.142857142857143*a1 + 0.571428571428571*a2*n - 0.142857142857143*a2 - 0.285714285714286*b1*n + 0.571428571428571*b1 - 0.142857142857143*b2*n + 0.571428571428571*b2 + 0.571428571428571*b3 + 0.571428571428571*c1*n - 0.142857142857143*c1 - 0.142857142857143*c2 + 1.42857142857143)



P2=

Profit2=

0.571428571428571*a1*n - 0.142857142857143*a1 + 0.571428571428571*a2*n - 0.142857142857143*a2 - 0.285714285714286*b1*n + 0.571428571428571*b1 - 0.142857142857143*b2*n - 11.4285714285714*b2 + 0.571428571428571*b3 + 0.571428571428571*c1*n - 0.142857142857143*c1 - 0.142857142857143*c2 + (0.571428571428571 - 0.142857142857143*n)*(a1*n + a2*n + b1 + b2 + b3 + c1*n - 5) + (0.571428571428571 - 0.142857142857143*n)*(-0.428571428571428*a1*n - 0.142857142857143*a1 - 0.428571428571428*a2*n - 0.142857142857143*a2 - 0.285714285714285*b1*n - 0.428571428571428*b1 - 0.142857142857143*b2*n - 0.428571428571428*b2 - 0.428571428571428*b3 - 0.428571428571428*c1*n - 0.142857142857143*c1 - 0.142857142857143*c2 + 6.42857142857143) + (-0.142857142857143*n - 0.428571428571428)*(0.571428571428571*a1*n - 0.142857142857143*a1 + 0.571428571428571*a2*n - 0.142857142857143*a2 - 0.285714285714286*b1*n + 0.571428571428571*b1 - 0.142857142857143*b2*n + 0.571428571428571*b2 + 0.571428571428571*b3 + 0.571428571428571*c1*n - 0.142857142857143*c1 - 0.142857142857143*c2 + 1.42857142857143) + 1.42857142857143

P3=

P3=

Profits3=

The function is concave with respect to c1 for n = 1

The function is concave with respect to c2 for n = 0
The function is concave with respect to c2 for n = 1
The function is concave with respect to c2 for n = 0.2
The function is concave with respect to c2 for n = 0.5
The function is concave with respect to c2 for n = 0.8



The first derivative of the profits with respect to c1 is:
